column4: LOL anyone ever figure out how to make flash play sound?  I got side-conversed for a while and my scroll-back history is, well, history
its cuz Flash for linux wants to use raw ALSA... but ESD is occupying your sound card  :/
COOL.  But do I *need* ESD?  Besides that, I have two sound cards... motherboard sound and Audigy2ZS.  Can't I just use ESD for one and drop it on the other?
Good to have an explanation.  yeah, it is AC97 codec and does sound crappy compared to the Audigy2.
